input.sentences: we are getting to that age where we are going to milestone birthday parties .
at least we get to see our friends .
here is the pretty 40th birthday cake .
the birthday boy was waiting for the candles to be lit .
we dimmed the lights for him to make his wish .
output.sentences: This birthday party was a huge milestone.
Jamie was surrounded by all of her friends.
They all got together to make a pretty birthday cake.
Everyone waited patiently for the candles to be lit.
The lights dimmed and the crowd started singing happy birthday.
